local_intent: Lift the grasped lid vertically by 0.1 to clear the pot rim and confirm the grasp remains stable.
assumptions: Lid is already grasped by the gripper.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT segment immediately after Pick: perform vertical MoveDelta(z, 0.1) and verify with IsGraspStable before retreat and confirming pot open.
